properties.areaDesc: 5NM East of a line from Fairport MI to Rock Island Passage; Green Bay North of line from Cedar River MI to Rock Island Passage; Seul Choix Point to Point Detour MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 4 at 9:52PM EST until January 6 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and waves
2 to 4 feet expected.

* WHERE...5NM East of a line from Fairport MI to Rock Island
Passage, Green Bay North of line from Cedar River MI to Rock
Island Passage and Seul Choix Point to Point Detour MI.

* WHEN...From 7 PM Sunday to 10 AM EST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM SUNDAY TO 10 AM EST MONDAY
